titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 45) increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.
Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 45) increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-411, by Mr. McGovern.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.J. Res. 45. The Senate amendment shall be considered read. The motion to concur in the Senate amendment shall be debatable for one hour. The question of adoption of the motion shall be divided between concurring in the matter preceding title I of the Senate amendment and concurring in the matter comprising titles I and II of the Senate amendment.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 158.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1065.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 1065, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Sessions demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 195 (Roll no. 45).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 212 (Roll no. 46).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 45) increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.
